description:
Lala and Rito are late for school, and Lala takes the opportunity to confess her feelings for him. They use a teleportation device to get to school faster, but they arrive sans clothing!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Mou Ichido Koko kara / Ofuroba Sensou / Tick Tack Tick Tack Koi no Oto
Once Again from Here / Bathroom War / Tick-Tock, Tick-Tock, the Sound of Love
Une fois de plus en partant d`ici / Guerre dans les bains publics / Tic tac tic tac le son de l`amour
もう一度ここから / お風呂場戦争 / チクタクチクタク恋の音♡
